SELECT pd_bno, pd_type, pd_name, pd_file, pd_price, pd_stock, pd_date, pd_readcount FROM ( SELECT pd_bno, pd_type, pd_name, pd_file, pd_price, pd_stock, pd_date, pd_readcount, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY pd_bno DESC) AS RNUM FROM sae_product WHERE 1=1 and pd_type = 'g'
) WHERE pd_type = 'g' AND (RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd}) ORDER BY pd_bno DESC
